modName: Cut Content - Windhelm Arena - Legendary Edition
summary:
During development Windhelm was going to have an Arena. Now it does again.
Kind of.
descriptionHtml:
First, sorry for my English and it's my first port to Special Edition to Legendary Edition.
This mod come alongside with an English Edition and a French Edition atm.

This mod is a Legendary Edition port of the original [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9485?]Cut Content - Windhelm Arena[/url]﻿ [color=#f1f1f1]Mod by [/color][color=#f1f1f1]leedsfuzz. He have a lot of request for a Legendary Edition port, mine included, so he graciously give me permission to upload a version for LE that I have put together. If you need the permission, I can upload it, too.

Since I don't wanna use the (original) mod image(s) and description, you're free to check the mod page, image(s) and description, so you can ENDORSE the mod as a "thank you note" for the mod author, please.

Faq:
(Made from posts of the original mod page)
[/color]
Q: What does it do?
A: From the mod author:

[color=#f1f1f1]"During development Windhelm was going to have an Arena. Now it does again.
[/color]Kind of."

[color=#f1f1f1]This mod re-add the Windhelm Pit [NOT THE TRUE ONE] and the Bloodworks. By "not the true one" I mean, you cannot fight. It's mainly an "atmospheric" Windhelm mod, since they are few mod with the Windhelm Pit "restored" I was more than happy when I've found this little gem on Skyrim Special Edition.

And like a lot of user, I wanted to have it here, on Legendary Edition.
So I've done my best to port this mod here, on Legendary Edition.

Alongside with the English and the French Edition, you can find some "Bonus" Files.
Bonus Files:

- You can change the original windows mod meshes in the Bloodworks by another one, see screenshots and files folder, please.
- For my French friends, you can find an esp who will translate the name of the "Pit Fan" by "Fan de Fosse" ; I hope you like it!

Q: Will be able to fight?
[/color]A: No sorry, but, here we go -> [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=119305443]Faction: Pit Fighter[/url]﻿.

Q: Will you restore the whole Windhelm Pit and Bloodworks and all made by Bethesda?
A: No sorry.

Q: What mod can conflict with?
A: Maybe not ALL but a LOT of Windhelm's mod.

Q: This mod is compatible with [Insert random mod name here]?
A:

COMPATIBLE WITH:Cutting Room Floor
The Notice Board
Windhelm HD Retexture (2K version)

NOT COMPATIBLE WITH:
Bells of Skyrim
Open Cities

Q: Will there be a patch for [Insert random mod name here]?
A: No sorry.

Q: Does this replace the Grey Quarters?
A: No.

Q: The voices on this mod are in English or it (will) works in all languages?
A: The voices on this mod are in English and in all languages I guess.

Eg:
I play on a French edition of Skyrim, and I've the French voices when I use this mod.

Since this mod use content MADE but CUT by Bethesda, this mod "restore" these resources, using part of the files you've installed for Skyrim.
So depending on the npc languages/voices on your game, this mod will use the same as the other npc.

Q: Requirements?
A: An up-to-date Skyrim.

Q: And?
A: And if I've missing something, please let me know!

Q: Credits?
All assets here are made by Bethesda and belong to them.

Credits list and thanks:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9485?]Cut Content - Windhelm Arena﻿[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73714/]Windhelm Pit 2[/url]﻿ - Other Windhelm Pit (Used as a jail)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40676?]Windows Resource Pack[/url]
author: leedsfuzz and setvi
